internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter any internal identifier used for this recording

channel._instruction: Enter the names or identifiers of the recording channels contained in this recording

channelObject._instruction: Enter all the recording channels contained in this recording

timeStep._instruction: Time step (inverted sampling frequency) of data

order._instruction: If this recording is part of a sequence (sweeps, repetitions), enter the order(s) in that sequence contained in this recording

description._instruction: Enter a description of this recording.

devices._instruction: Add all the devices used for this recording

unitOfMeasurement._instruction: Add the unit(s) of measurement of this recording. If there is a single value, it should apply to all channels, if different channels have different units, provide an array of the same size as the number of channels.

dataLocation._instruction: Add the locations of the files / file bundles in which the recorded data are stored
